page.title: 01PASTORAL MID-DEVON
page.content: The block contains the village of Monkokehampton and parts of the parishes of Monkokehampton, Iddesleigh and Heathersleigh. It is predominately grassland, and is farmed in 20 seperate units. Of these 9 keep dairy cows, 16 beef cattle and 16 breeding sheep. Small acreages of cereals are grown in 12 farms. A few also keep some pigs and poultry. Asle farm, iddesleigh, keep several rare breeds of farm animals, founders of The Rare Breeds Survival Trust. "Farms for city children" run Nethercott House, Iddesleigh, where young school children, from cities in the South and Midlands come for weekly courses, learning and working on the farm. Local children go by bus, either to Winkleigh School (5-11 years) ot Chulanleigh (11-16 years). Monkokehampton is a small village in
